concept.title: SDIO Quick Start Guide
concept.shortdesc: Provides a collection of documents that describe SDIO (Secure Digital Input Output).

section.title: Getting started with SDIO
section.p: The SDIO overview provides a description of the basic concepts relevant to SDIO.
The technology guide provides a description of the technologies used by SDIO.
The interface overview document provides a description to the SDIO adaptation APIs.
The implementation overview describes how SDIO is included in a build of the Symbian platform.
The building document describes how to include the SDIO adaptation in a ROM image.
The SDIO BT Example document describes a reference implementation of SDIO.
The testing documentation describes techniques that can be used for testing the SDIO functionality.
The tools overview describes the tools that can be used to test an implementation of SDIO.

section.title: Architecture
section.p: The following illustration shows the basic architecture of SDIO.

section.title: Technologies
section.p: SDIO is a standard that combines an SD (Secure Digital) card and an I/O device to produce a peripheral that can use an SD slot.
